title: Flash needs to be fixed

embed.description: Try to bring in a conversation. I know some of you may not agree with me so try to deliver a good argument. Follow me: ► https://www.facebook.com/Necrit94 ► https://twitter.com/Necrit94 Donation button now open: https://goo.gl/ArNwe8

body: Flash needs to be removed OR it need to be a non combat spell. i.e out of combat for 5 seconds before being able to use it.

replies.body: You watch the video? This is all actually true. Riot never intended flash or teleport to be SOOOO crucial. teleport should only work up to towers or destroyed ally towers

> [{quoted}](name=Elbowblade,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=BX9rPur9,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-02T21:13:56.807+0000)
>
> You watch the video? This is all actually true. Riot never intended flash or teleport to be SOOOO crucial. teleport should only work up to towers or destroyed ally towers

Master troll :^)

No... There are gap closing champions to think about. There are people who aren't good with dodging pulls. 
Removing flash would be ridiculous. 
This guy just straight up pointed out the champions that would be bad or next to useless without these spells, so... let's remove the spells..
Doesn't make sense. 

Flash can be pretty punishing if you screw it up. Like messing up flashing over a wall when an entire team is chasing you, being baited and flashing under tower to secure what they think is an easy kill and taking turret shots for it, flashing into brush thinking you outsmarted whoever was chasing you and not realising it is warded. 
Flash can be rewarding but it can also be punishing. If you screw it up, you have to wait for that cooldown and while you wait, you might eat a death you could've flashed out of successfully.
